name: 愛依
text: プロデューサー、今日のステージ、なんかまぶしくない？
trans: Producer, isn't today's stage kind of blinding?

name: プロデューサー
trans: (Seems like she's concerned about the lighting)

If you keep staring
you'll get used to it.

We could try to
ask them to adjust it.

text:
変わらないと
思うけど
trans:
I don't think you can
change that though.

name: 愛依
text:
ま、それしかないよね～
サンキュ、ちょっと慣らしてくんね！
trans:
Well, I have no choice~
Thank you, I'll try to get used to it!

name: 愛依
text:
マジで？　あ～でも、迷惑になっちゃうっしょ？
気持ちだけもらっとくわ！　サンキュ！
trans:
For real? Ah, but isn't that bothersome?
Well I appreciate the thought! Thank you!

name: プロデューサー
text: （とりあえず大丈夫そうかな）

name: 愛依
text:
え～、そんなもん？
絶対まぶしいと思うんだけど～
trans:
Eh? That's just life?
But they definitely seem blinding~

name: プロデューサー
text: （思った以上に気になっているみたいだ）
